pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, May 5, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, May 5, 2016:

Ottawa

11:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Alex Trebek.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

12:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the 2016 4-H Canada Citizenship Congress and hold a Q&A with students.

Room 112-N
Center Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks and Q&A with students

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the National Holocaust Remembrance Day Ceremony.

Canadian War Museum
LeBreton Gallery
1 Vimy Place
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:15 p.m.

PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
